Title: Relates to requiring that the sale or delivery of body vests occur in person
Summary: Relates to requiring that the sale or delivery of body vests occur in person; provides exemptions for officials of a local law enforcement agency or of the division of state police, officials purchasing body vests on behalf of a local law enforcement agency or the division of state police or to a member of the national guard or other reserve component of the armed forces.
LawCode: Add ยง396-eee, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to requiring that the sale or delivery of body vests occur in person
